haunted_path_specter.name: Haunted Path: Specter
haunted_path_specter.desc: Build up spectral energy by performing successful dodges and landing Wind mantras. Phantom winds from Haunted Gale no longer appear. You can no longer suffocate enemies.

vanishing_wraith.name: Vanishing Wraith
vanishing_wraith.desc: Your 'Aerial Attacks' while in Phantom Step will now teleport you behind your target.

possession.name: Possession
possession.desc:
After an apparition hits an enemy, receive 15% posture damage on all Galebreath attacks for 6 seconds. If the apparition hits while you have Phantom Step activated, receive a 15% chip damage buff as well for the same duration.
[*This talent loses some effectiveness when below its requirements.]

apparitions.name: Apparitions
apparitions.desc: Your Haunted Phantoms become Apparitions that apply Winded on hit. Apparitions cannot be parried if you are in Phantom Step.

phantom_step.name: Phantom Step
phantom_step.desc: Press X to begin running at high speeds and your regular dashes transform into gale dashes. (Must have at least 10% Spectral Gauge)
